GeneratedBy.Name: ezBIDS
GeneratedBy.Description: ezBIDS is a web-based tool for converting neuroimaging datasets to BIDS, requiring neither coding nor knowledge of the BIDS specification

GeneratedBy.Name: Custom BIDS conversion scripts for GE research sequences
GeneratedBy.Description: Several in-house scripts were developed to convert the GE research diffusion sequences (i.e., 4shell96dir, 2shell93dir, and 3shell45dir) to BIDS.
